name: NEON-G
description:
this was made for the BP5 jam with my awesome  team :

programmer me(d!P#0281)

artist HexusBR (gurt#2119)

artist "D"#5827

pro helper chillgunner (▀▄▀▄▀▄ ς𝒽𝐈Ⓛ𝐥Ꮆ𝕌𝐍Ⓝ𝑒ⓡ ▄▀▄▀▄▀#7301)

In this cyberpunk world your vehicle needs energy to go on, so you need to kill enemies to get the energy or you will die. Have fun!
